ygData.subject: Oh yeah baby.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunchtime I log on and ask a level 45 if she can help me get a quest item, I join her group (2 x 45 Japanese) and we go off to the king room in Sol A and start
ygData.messageBody:
Lunchtime I log on and ask a level 45 if she can help me get a quest item,
I join her group (2 x 45 Japanese) and we go off to the king room in Sol A
and start kicking ass (no exp) We killed a Sol mage (no Firewalker boots)
and we killed 2 Sol Champs (no Fiery Vambraces), and just as it was time
for me to log a Sol Champ spawns right in front of me and we kill it, and
what have we got? A rather nice item - Fiery Vambraces, AC 6 +5 Sv Fire
(looks like steel when worn), but most importantly it is the harder part of
my Lambent Vambraces Quest so I'm absolutely delighted.
I just wished I could of stayed longer to get some Firewalker Boots too.

Madagan, who has now got to kill Froon in Wesk Karana.
